articles.title: Amy Schumer Announces Divorce From Husband Chris Fischer - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The actress shared the news on Instagram, where she wrote, "We love each other very much and will continue to focus on raising our son."

articles.title: New York tourist stabbed while changing baby’s diaper in Macy’s restroom, suspect charged: Police - ABC News
Could Kenny Dillingham take the Michigan head coaching job? - Arizona Sports
articles.description: Kenny Dillingham put rumors of his departure to rest when he was a hot name for top openings, but that was before the Michigan job opened up.

articles.title: At meeting on Florida's plan to end school vaccine mandates, skeptics and doctors stand off - NBC News
articles.description: Florida's health department plans to repeal mandates that schoolchildren be vaccinated for hepatitis B, chickenpox and two other viruses.

articles.title: SpaceX Sets Insider Share Deal at About $800 Billion Valuation - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: SpaceX is moving forward with an insider share sale that values Elon Musk’s rocket and satellite maker at about $800 billion, setting up what could be the largest initial public offering of all time.

articles.title: DOJ sues Georgia county as Trump pushes debunked 2020 election fraud claims - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump has increasingly pressured his administration to find widespread voter fraud in the 2020 election, despite those claims having been debunked and dismissed in dozens of cases by the courts.

articles.title: Google Removes AI Videos of Disney Characters After Cease and Desist Letter - Variety
articles.description: Google has taken down dozens of AI-generated videos of Disney-owned characters after the studio sent a cease and desist letter on Wednesday.

articles.title: National Trust sues to stop Trump’s ballroom construction - The Washington Post
articles.description: The organization, which is charged by Congress with historic preservation, is seeking to halt construction on one of the president’s priorities.

articles.title: Jim Harbaugh “still processing” Sherrone Moore’s firing at Michigan - NBC Sports
articles.description: Sherrone Moore's dismissal as the University of Michigan's head coach and his ensuing arrest were major stories around the football world this week.

articles.title: Thai and Cambodian leaders agree to renew a ceasefire after days of deadly clashes, Trump says - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump says Thai and Cambodian leaders have agreed to renew a truce after days of deadly clashes threatened to undo a ceasefire he helped broker earlier this year. Trump announced the agreement to restart the ceasefire in a social media postin…

articles.title: Myles Garrett reaches out to Steelers rival T.J. Watt in the wake of his collapsed lung - Cleveland.com
articles.description: Myles Garrett reached out to Steelers rival T.J. Watt after he suffered a collapsed lung.

articles.title: 'She's awesome': How U.S. veterans helped Venezuela's Machado escape - NPR
articles.description: In a daring nighttime martime operation, U.S. veterans whisked Venezuela's María Corina Machado out of the country to claim her Nobel Peace Prize in Oslo

articles.title: US TikTok investors in limbo as deal set to be delayed again - BBC
articles.description: A deal to sell TikTok has remained elusive, despite earlier claims that a deal was done.

articles.title: Indiana GOP’s Trump rebuke could lead to temporary redistricting detente - Politico
articles.description: It doesn’t mean the redistricting wars are over.

articles.title: Comet 3I/ATLAS is getting greener and brighter as it approaches Earth, new images reveal - Live Science
articles.description: New images taken with the Gemini North telescope in Hawaii confirm that the interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS has gotten brighter and greener since its close flyby of the sun in October.

articles.title: Growing number of House Republicans sign on to effort to force vote on ACA subsidies -- defying Speaker Johnson - ABC News
Reddit Sues Australian Government for Under-16 Social Media Ban - The Wall Street Journal
King Charles III says he'll scale back cancer treatment thanks to early diagnosis - CBS News
articles.description: King Charles III says that his cancer treatment will be reduced in the new year because of early diagnosis, effective intervention and adherence to doctor's orders.
